name: Emerald Shores (itch)
description:
Run!  Jump!  Level up!

Emerald Shores is a challenging SNES-inspired platformer, set in a quirky world, with a bunch of twists.

Level up, take on rewarding sidequests, play unique minigames, unlock secret levels, raise a pet monster, fight an optional mega-leveled beast of a boss, and more!

Travel across a huge world map as you find your way to the floating island of Emerald Shores and liberate it from the invading monsters.

When you've completed the main storyline, take on Remix Mode, which rearranges each of the game's levels to be even more brutal.

Free strategy guide!

There's a free, web-based strategy guide at the developer's website.

http://fordesoft.com/strategy-guides/emerald-shores/cover

This will show you how to unlock all of the minigames, conquer the sidequests, etc.

Controls:

For best results, play with a PlayStation 4 controller is recommended.  Xbox One controllers work perfectly as well, but all controls are displayed with the PlayStation button configurations.

Keyboard play is not recommended, but controls are below:

Arrow keys: move

Space bar: jump

Tab: read signs

Enter: start, pause

Left control: go back in menus

Escape: exits game immediately

Free Steam key provided with every itch.io purchase!

That's right - if you buy the game here on itch.io, and you'll instantly receive a Steam key for the game, along with your DRM-free copy.
